attributes.action: recognise the fact that all politicians are employed by the people to enact their wishes rather than to follow their own consciences.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Government and politicians as a whole appear to have forgotten that they are effectively employees of the people. They are paid by the people and all the money they spend belongs to the people.

All politicians are urged to widely canvass opinion among as many as possible of their their constituents (rather than simply listening to pressure groups with a particular axe to grind) BEFORE they vote on any major decision and NOT simply to follow a party line.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
